Steps.Description: Use Trick;
if it stays, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed sweep
if opponent switches into Flygon, switch to Excadrill Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Use Stealth Rock
if it stays, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed sweep
if opponent switches into Gliscor, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick.
Switch to Chandelure and use Calm mind + X.Speed sweep
Use Trick;
Switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Use Trick;
if you get Black Sludge, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed sweep
if you get Choice Scarf, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
if you get Focus Sash, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
if you get Life Orb, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
if it switches out into Flygon, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
if it switches out into Gliscor, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed sweep
if it switches out into Steelix, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Use Trick;
if it uses Superpower, use Stealth Rock Switch. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it uses X-Scissor, switch to Poliwrath X.Defend + X.Speed Use an Energy Root/Hyper Potion then use Belly Drum and sweep.
if it switches out into Gliscor, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Flygon will come, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Use Trick;
if it uses Drill Run, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
if it uses Megahorn, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill it
if Drapion is sent out, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
if Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses Bulldoze or it switches into Gliscor, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Flygon will come, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses Earthquake
And you get Leftovers, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
And you get Rocky Helmet, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it uses Scald, use Stealth Rock and then switch to Blissey. Switch to the second Metagross and use Trick
if it switches back to Gastrodon, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches to Flygon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches to Flygon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Stealth Rock and then switch to Blissey and use Trick
if it switches into Durant, switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Ferrothorn/Tyranitar, switch back to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill. It will send in Kabutops. Immediately switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if Gliscor is sent out, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses Crabhammer, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if Sceptile comes out, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Swords Dance + X.Speed
if Steelix is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses Surf, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if Steelix is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it stays, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if Steelix is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses Superpower, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if Flygon is sent out, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch in Excadrill Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it uses Bug Bite, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Flygon will come, Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it stays, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Swords Dance + X.Speed
if Gliscor is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Steelix will come out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey then switch back to Metagross and use Trick;
if it switches out into Ferrothorn, switch to Excadrill: 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches out into Gliscor, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it stays, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if Kabutops comes in, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses Hidden Power, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Rhyperior. Switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it uses Spore, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Let it switch to Rhyperior
if it uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it uses Stone Edge, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches into Hippowdon/Rhyperior, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if you get Chesto Berry, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Rhyperior. Switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if you get Choice Scarf, switch to Poliwrath then switch to second Metagross as it switches out to Donphan/Rhyperior. Use Trick then switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If it swaps back to Blastoise during setup switch to Poli, then switch to Metagross Stealth Rock, then Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches out into Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it stays, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure Calm Mind
if it switches to Camerupt, switch to Chandelure Calm Mind
if it switches to Donphan, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if out comes Parasect while you set up, kill it. Parasect is sent out, so switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum
if it switches to Rhyperior
And you get Leftovers, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if out comes Parasect while you set up, kill it. Parasect is sent out, so switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum
And you get Life Orb, switch to Chandelure Calm Mind
Use Trick;
Switch to Chandelure Calm Mind
Use Trick;
if it switches to Gliscor, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches out into Rhyperior, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches into Blastoise, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum
if it switches out into Parasect, use Iron Head to kill. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum
Use Trick;
if it uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it uses Fire Punch, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Steelix, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if you get Choice Band, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: X.Speed
if you get Life Orb
And it uses Superpower, use Stealth Rock and then switch to Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Special + X.Speed
if it switches out, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick;
if it switched into Gliscor/Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill: 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switched into Hippowdon, switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + 2x X.Speed
And it uses X-Scissor, switch to Poliwrath: X.Defend + Belly Drum + X.Speed
if Amoonngus comes out, use Ice Punch to kill. Switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind
if Rhyperior comes out, use Drain Punch until Cloyster comes out. Set up Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches out into Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure: X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure then switch to Blissey and repeat. Switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross and use Trick as it finally switches out into Gliscor
Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed

if it switches out into Amoonguss, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Let Rhyperior come in and use Protect, then switch back to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed Let Excadrill tank ROck Blast. Use Iron Head vs. Gengar.
Switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock; (use Iron Head or Shadow Ball vs Gengar)
if it used Shadow Ball
And it uses Focus Blast, switch to Chandelure then switch to Blissey again and use Trick;
if you get Black Sludge and it locks Focus Blast, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if you get Life Orb and it locked Focus Blast, use Protect
if you get a -1 SpDef debuff, immediately switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Durant, switch to Chandelure 2x X.Speed
if it switches into Rhyperior;
And you get Life Orb, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
And you get Passho Berry, switch to Chandelure and switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 2x X.Speed
And if anything else from above, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if you get Life Orb and it locked Thunderbolt, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches into Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
And it switches into Durant, switch to Chandelure 2x X.Speed
And it switches into Rhyperior, switch back to Excadrill then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it used Will-O-Wisp, switch to Chandelure then switch back to Metagross and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed Use Shadow Ball vs. Gengar
if opponent swaps to Amoongus, use Trick. Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it stays, Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure X.Speed
if it switches into Parasect, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure X.Speed
Use Trick;
Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey, switch back to Metagross Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses Leech Life, switch to Poliwrath, use Belly Drum as it switches out to Donphan. Kill it with Drain Punch. Blastoise comes out. Switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance and sweep
if it uses Leech Seed, use Stealth Rock as it switches out to Durant (Choice Band'ed), then switch to Chandelure:  X.Special + X.Speed
if it switches into Rhyperior, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Excadrill then switch to Blissey Trick as it switches out into Rhyperior.
if you get Leftovers, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed (Iron Head vs Gengar)
if you get Life Orb, switch to Chandelure Calm Mind
Use Trick;
if Focus Sash, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if Life Orb, Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if Leftovers, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Iron Head vs. Gengar
if Passho Berry, switch to switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure X.Speed
if Rocky Helmet, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it stays, switch to Blissey Trick. Follow Rhyperior solve below.
if it switches to Hippowdon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches to Rhyperior
And you get Life Orb, switch to Chandelure  Calm Mind
And you get Rocky Helmet, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed (use Iron Head vs Gengar)
Use Trick;
if it stays, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Seismitoad, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure Calm Mind
if it switches to Rhyperior after using Calm Mind, switch to the second Metagross Trick then switch back into Chandelure Calm Mind
Use Trick;
if it uses Super Fang, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Dragonite, switch to Metagross Trick then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Dragonite, switch to Metagross Trick then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if Choice Band, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it stays and you get other items, switch to the second Metagross;
if it switches out into Rotom, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Salamence, use Trick then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Ludicolo, use Stealth Rock;
if it uses Leech Seed, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches out to Bronzong while you set up, Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches into Medicham, switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball to KO
if Lucidolo is sent out again, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches out to Bronzong while you set up, Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if Houndoom is sent out, switch to Blissey Trick then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it uses Scald, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches out to Bronzong while you set up, Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches into Rotom-Heat/Salamence, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Excadrill and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Blissey then switch to Chandelure. Switch back into Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses Drain Punch, switch to Chandelure as Rotom comes out. Switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if Rotom comes out, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches into Bouffalant, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses Drain Punch, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it uses Payback, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches to Salamence, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if you get Expert Belt use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Bouffalant, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if you get Leftovers, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Blissey and use Trick, locking Sacred Fire. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Switch to Blissey then switch to Metagross. Medicham will come out, so switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball. It will send out either Houndoom or Ludicolo. Switch back to Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses High Jump Kick, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure X.Special + X.Speed

if it uses High Jump Kick misses vs. Metagross, Stealth Rock then swap to Chandelure and Flamethrower to kill it. Entei will come out, switch to Metagross (with scarf) and Trick. Switch back to Chandelure, 2x Calm Mind and X.Speed
if it switches out to Steelix, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it used Scald, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
if it switches into Bronzong, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it used Leech Seed, use Stealth Rock;
if it switches out into Bronzong, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches out into Medicham, switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball. Switch to Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out to Salamence, switch to the second Metagross Trick, then switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches out to Salamence, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches out into Ludicolo, switch to Blissey and use Trick;
Step2c. if it stays, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step2c. if it switches out into Conkeldurr, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses Energy Ball, use Stealth Rock then switch to Blissey. Switch to Metagross then switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it uses Drain Punch / Hidden Power, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Bouffalant, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches into Dragonite, switch to Blissey then switch to Chandelure. Bouffalant comes out, so switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it uses Leech Seed, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches out into Bronzong, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches out into Dragonite, switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Dragonite, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches out into Entei, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Salamence, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Steelix, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches into Charizard, switch to  Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure and then switch to Blissey;
if it used Thunderbolt;
and it doesn’t have Life Orb
and it stays, use Trick
if it uses Cross Chop, switch back to Metagross, Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it uses Focus Blast, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Conkeldurr, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if Blissey dies, add an X.Defend to Chandelure
if it switches into Medicham;
and it has Choice Scarf, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath: X.Speed + Belly Drum
if it switches out into Bronzong, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
and it has a Life Orb, use Stealth Rock then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
and it switches into Dragonite, use Stealth Rock. Switch back to Chandelure and switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch once again to Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
and it has a Life Orb, use Trick;
if it stays, switch to Metagross;
if it switches into Arcanine, use Trick then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Blaziken, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Haxorus/Infernape, use Trick then switch to Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Arcanine/Blaziken, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Haxorus/Infernape, switch to Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Bronzong, switch to Metagross and use Trick;
if it stays, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches into Rotom, switch to Excadrill: Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches into Rotom, switch to Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Dragonite, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches into Bouffalant, switch to Chandelure, then into Metagross and use Trick. Stealth Rock and switch into Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if you get Choice Scarf;
and it uses Thunder Punch, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
and it uses other moves, switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball. Out comes Houndoom/Ludicolo, so switch to Blissey Trick and use Stealth Rock. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if you get Life Orb, switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball. Out comes Magmortar, so switch to Blissey Trick and use Stealth Rock. Switch back to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Switch to Blissey then switch to Metagross. Switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball to KO Medicham. Out comes Houndoom/Ludicolo, so switch to Blissey Trick and use Stealth Rock. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Houndoom, switch into Metagross and use Trick, then switch into Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Ludicolo, switch into Blissey, then switch into Metagross and use Trick as it switches into Typhlosion. Switch into Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Magmortar, switch into Metagross and use Trick, then switch into Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross and use Earthquake. Out comes Salamence/Steelix, so switch to Chandelure then switch back to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches out into Ludicolo, switch to Blissey Trick. Then switch back once more into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed

if it’s Intimidate, switch to Blissey Stealth Rock. Switch to Metagross and switch to Chandelure and do this twice. Switch back to Metagross and use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it’s Moxie, use Trick
if it uses Fire Blast, switch back to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches out into Ludicolo, switch to Blissey Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if you get Metal Coat, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if you get Rocky Helmet, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches into Dragonite, switch to Blissey then switch to Chandelure. Switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches into Charizard, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Dragonite, switch to Blissey then switch to Chandelure. Switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it stays, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Dragonite, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Stealth Rock
if it stays, switch to Blissey Trick then switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out into Hydreigon, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses a Water-Type move or it switches out into Dragonite, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches out into Hydreigon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if it uses Flamethrower, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it uses Will-0-Wisp, Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if you get Assault Vest, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend
if you get Choice Scarf, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if you get Leftovers/Life Orb, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches out to Hydreigon, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches out into Bronzong, use Stealth Rock;
if it stays and uses Earthquake, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Slowbro, use Stealth Rock again to see what it does;
if it uses Flamethrower, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it uses Scald, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if it switches out into Dragonite
